name: Tunermorph: Normal (Duel Links Skill)
text: (This Skill has been adapted to work in our format, and it attempts to replicate its function in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links.)
skill_activation: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
skill_effect:
Reveal 1 Tuner monster in you hand and select a Normal Monster on your side of the field. The selected monster is treated as a Tuner monster.
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
